channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 7 Best OLED TVs (2025): Sony, LG, Samsung, and More
item.description: Looking to step up to the TV big leagues? These are the best OLED TVs you can buy.

item.title: SpaceX Starship Finally Pulls Off a Successful Test Flight
item.description: After being postponed twice—and after multiple failed attempts—Starship's tenth test flight was a success.

item.title: The Era of AI-Generated Ransomware Has Arrived
item.description: Cybercriminals are increasingly using generative AI tools to fuel their attacks, with new research finding instances of AI being used to develop ranso...

item.title: Google Vids adds AI avatars to its video editor and launches a consumer version
item.description: Google is launching a free consumer version of its video editor Vids that will be available without any AI-powered features.

item.title: Elehear Beyond Pro Review: Big Hearing Aids
item.description: With this update, Elehear doubles down on one of the largest hearing aid designs on the market.

item.title: Mirror founder Brynn Putnam to unveil her gaming hardware startup at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Seven years after unveiling Mirror at TechCrunch Disrupt 2018, Brynn Putnam is returning to the stage where it all began.

item.title: Terraton wants to be the McDonald’s of biochar
item.description: Terraton sees promise in biochar, but the technology has struggled to scale. The startup thinks a franchise model could be what unlocks biochar's pote...

item.title: Hyundai is working with a startup on plant-based leather that smells like the real thing
item.description: Uncaged Innovations is working with Hyundai to develop alternatives to leather with a fraction of the environmental impact.

item.title: PopSocket PopCase Kindle Hands-On (2025): Easy Reading
item.description: No more DIY additions to get a PopSocket on your Kindle: The PopCase Kindle makes it easy to add any grip onto the case’s built-in MagSafe ring.

item.title: Plaud launches a new AI hardware notetaker, the $179 Note Pro
item.description: Plaud.ai launches its new Plaud Note Pro hardware notetaker with better mics and recording range.
